content: marker round 1 *ssk k to two stitches before marker k2tog* repeat between *s to end of round 10 stitches decreased round 2 knit repeat these two rounds 8 10 times 16 20 rounds total 15 stitches remain 3 stitches between each of the markers next round k3tog around removing markers 5 stitches break yarn and thread through the remaining 5 stitches tighten to close weave in ends and attach pompom as demonstrated in the video if desired copyright 2018 staci perry this pattern and pictures are the property of staci perry all rights reserved pattern is available for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content including text or pictures is allowed no commercial reproduction of garments from this pattern is allowed without prior permission from staci perry
